revised_title: Continuation of the Method of Fluxions and Applications to Algebraic Expressions
tldr: The author continues his treatise on fluxions, discussing the algebraic expressions and operations involved in calculus. He explains the use of symbols, the relationship between positive and negative quantities, and the determination of fluxions. The text also covers the direct and inverse methods of fluxions, as well as the application of these methods to various mathematical problems.
